content.prompt: The writer wants to alter the passage for an audience that is unfamiliar with the historical period of Shakespeare’s time. Which of the following changes best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: In sentence 4, changing “the Victorian era” to “Queen Victoria’s reign”
In sentence 10, deleting “in Latin, the classics, and rhetoric”
In sentence 11, adding “(equivalent to a modern-day mayor)” after “bailiff”

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Demonstrate an understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
